channel.title: The Arcade Fire
channel.description:
The arcade fire are one of the greatest bands out there at the moment. Unique, musically talented, important messages. There music is beautiful.
[img]http://www.pollstaronline.com/CIC2006/Awards17/images/AwardWinners/arcade-fire.jpg[/img]
There latest album: [url=http://www.torrentspy.com/torrent/1089912/Arcade_Fire_Neon_Bible_2007]http://www.torrentspy.com/torrent/1089912/Arcade_Fire_Neon_Bible_2007[/url]
There previous album (the best) [url=http://www.torrentspy.com/torrent/1090478/Arcade_Fire_Funeral_2004]http://www.torrentspy.com/torrent/1090478/Arcade_Fire_Funeral_2004[/url]
I am going to see them live tomorrow at the apollo in manchester, they are the such great live band, give there album a try. Even if you a gangsta rap fan or an emo appreciate how talented this band are with pushing the boudaries of music forward.
[img]http://photos4.flickr.com/4032318_2eea23379f.jpg[/img]

The arcade fire are one of the greatest bands out there at the moment. Unique, musically talented, important messages. There music is beautiful.
